channel.title: JPQL on Tobys Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in JPQL on Tobys Portfolio

item.title: How we are doing now - week 2
item.description:
Building a Membership System – Starting Simple, Thinking Ahead

When starting this portfolio project, I made one thing very clear to myself:
this project is not about building everything at once – it is about building something real, step by step.

In the past, I have often struggled with getting started on larger projects.
Not because I lack ideas, but because I tend to overthink structure, architecture, and future requirements before anything actually exists.

item.title: How I get started!
item.description:
Starting simple

So, putting the cards on the table: I have a hard time getting started with… well, everything. I have always had that issue. But that’s not what I’m really going to talk about today… or write about, he he, I’ll have to get used to this blogging thing.

What I do want to write about today is how I get started, and this is something my dear wife has taught me over time:

item.title: The Beginning of My Project: Member Systems
item.description:
Portfolio Project

So, during the writing of my last blog post, I realised that I hadn’t explained what my project is actually about, so today I want to dive into that.

Member System
